title: Please help me to identify this font.
author: ricardo_am

comments.content:
Fengardo Neue (black and regular) by Luic Sander.  
 [http://www.photoshoproadmap.com/Photoshop-blog/fengardo-neue-font-family/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171039/http:/www.photoshoproadmap.com/Photoshop-blog/fengardo-neue-font-family/)
